artist: Engraver: Peter Spendelowe Lamborn; Painter: Jan Both
description: landscape; sun following rain; three fisherman with net and basket foreground; fisherman on bank left holding rope of net; steep cliff at right with 2 figures at bottom, one mounted, and ruins at top
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [Both pinxit  P.S. Lamborn sculp/ To the Right Reverend John Hinchliffe, DD/ Lord Bishob of Peterborough/ This Plate is most humbly Dedicated by his most obd\'t. humble Serv\'t P. S. Lamborn]; crest in center of inscription; in pencil on sheet: [1-164]
title: Print
